issue.title: [C++] [CI] Improve fuzzing seed corpus
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7632](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7632). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The coverage stats produced by OSS-Fuzz instruct us to guide the fuzzing process towards the following areas:
- extension arrays
- tensors
- sparse tensors

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7632?focusedCommentId=17020258) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Tensors and sparse tensors will probably necessitate a separate fuzz target.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7632?focusedCommentId=17020276) by Kenta Murata (mrkn):*
I will work for tensor and sparse tensor.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7632?focusedCommentId=17020641) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6241
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6241>
